reasoning: PTSD prevalence estimated at 3.5% of global population (3,500 per 100k). Chronic PTSD is a subtype/progression of acute PTSD. Used prevalence metric as incidence is poorly defined for psychiatric conditions. Data from meta-analyses and WHO estimates.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2005). Lifetime and 12-month prevalence of DSM-IV disorders in the United States. J Clin Psychiatry. 66(5):617-627
